summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1883 for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventieth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing watermains therein or proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No.19551, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
